brand.name: ABS Immo Services
brand.description: Advisory firm specialized in the structuring, securing and enhancement of high-value strategic real estate assets.

positioning.title: Positioning
positioning.text: We do not operate as a traditional agency. Each mission is handled as a consulting mandate with a confidential and long-term approach.

hero.title: Real estate excellence serving your ambitions
hero.subtitle: ABS Immo Services supports individuals and investors in exceptional real estate projects across Senegal.

positioning.title: A strategic and sustainable real estate vision
positioning.p1: We select high-potential properties in the most attractive areas.
positioning.p2: Our approach is based on transparency, legal rigor and personalized support.
positioning.p3: Each project is handled with discretion and excellence.

v3.title: Performance
v3.text: Maximizing the value of your investment.

cta.title: Let’s discuss your project
cta.text: Our team is available to advise and support you.

hero.description: Our team supports you with expertise, discretion and excellence to bring your vision to life.

form.name: Full name
form.security: Your information is secure and confidential.

hero.description: ABS Immo Services supports private investors, family offices and companies in structuring, securing and enhancing real estate assets in Senegal.

cta.title: Access a confidential discussion
cta.text: All exchanges are strictly private. Each request is personally reviewed by a senior advisor.
cta.footer: ABS IMMO SERVICES · REAL ESTATE ADVISORY & STRUCTURING

hero.label: Private portfolio
